basic_info.title: University of Pretoria (UP) Commonwealth Scholarship 2025 (Fully Funded)
basic_info.author: Muhammad Saim Rasheed

program_details.description: Applications are open for the **University of Pretoria (UP) Commonwealth Scholarship 2025**. It is a **fully funded scholarship** for students from **Commonwealth countries**. South African citizens can not apply for this scholarship.

academic_requirements: Completed your postgraduate or Master’s degree within the past two years.

other_criteria: Residents of Commonwealth countries (excluding South Africa).
Plan to start studies University of Pretoria in 2025.
Must have submitted a separate application for admission to a UP doctoral program for the 2025 academic year.
Secured a potential supervisor at UP.
Have your academic records evaluated by the South African Qualification Authority (SAQA).
PhD and Masters students currently registered or who previously studied at the University of Pretoria are not eligible to apply for this scholarship.

required_documents: A motivation letter from the supervisor of the UP is needed.
An outline of the intended research work of one page.
Certificate of study leave from your current work organization.
Academic transcripts of all educational degrees.
Two reference letters from 2 different supervisors who know the applicant.
application_process: Download and fill out the official UP Commonwealth Scholarship application form.
Submit a separate application for admission to a doctoral program at the University of Pretoria for the 2025 academic year.
Prepare Required Documents given above. Ensure they are combined into a single PDF file.
Send your complete application package (scholarship application form and combined PDF of documents) to pgbursary@up.ac.za with the subject line “UP Commonwealth 2025“.
